page.title: 03Village of Wickhamford - one
page.content: The population of Wickhamford is 804. The main jobs of the villagers are market gardening, farming and work in local industry in Evesham. The old part of the village consists of a village hall, the church, the manor, several thatched cottages and other older houses. The new part has a small industrial estate and newer houses. No new major developments are planned. According to the village plan, only infilling between existing buildings will be allowed. An existing house is being converted into a nursing home for the elderly. The village hall is used for folk dancing, 60+ club, gardening club, discos and the playgroup meets there. Children of school age attend Badsey First School, then Blackminster Middle (about 2 miles away) and then The High School at Four Pools, Evesham.
